resources.string: An avocado is a bright green fruit with a large pit and dark leathery skin. They’re also known as alligator pears or butter fruit. Avocados are a favorite of the produce section. They’re the go-to ingredient for guacamole dips.
Banana is a fruit of an herbaceous flowering plant. The raw bananas used for cooking are known as plantains. The colour of banana may be yellow, green, brown, purple or red..
pineapple, ( Ananas comosus ), perennial plant of the family Bromeliaceae and its edible fruit. Pineapple is native to tropical and subtropical America and has been introduced elsewhere.
An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree (Malus domestica). Apple trees are cultivated worldwide and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus..
Coconut, fruit of the coconut palm, a tree of the palm family. It is one of the most important crops in the tropics. The coconut has a thick fibrous husk surrounding a single-seeded nut. ..
Mangoes are a rich source of vitamins A, C, and D. The tree is evergreen, often reaching 15–18 metres (50–60 feet) in height and attaining great age. .
